title: Cd-containing quantum dots transform during simulated human digestion causing increased adverse subcellular effects to intestinal cells
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,4255-4265
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00329B, Paper
Ke Xu, Aude Bechu, Connor Farrell, Niladri Basu, Subhasis Ghoshal, Saji George, Audrey Moores
Nanomaterials (NMs) entering the human body via the oral route are subjected to successive digestive chambers in the gastrointestinal (GI) tract, which altered their physicochemical properties and toxicity profile.
